underlying_goal: Improve the README.md of the dotfiles repository to better reflect the user's personalized setup.
primary_success: Performed a major restructure of the README, creating a personalized and high-quality document that highlighted the user's key configurations (Rust tools, Ghostty, htop, etc.) with feature tables and detailed descriptions.
brief_summary: The user requested an update to their dotfiles README to highlight their personal setup. Claude restructured the entire file, adding sections for Rust CLI tools, Ghostty, htop, and a macOS cleanup script, and then organized the final changes into logical commits.
